description:
****Course Updated June 2016****

Thanks for checking out this course: The Complete Front-End Frameworks Developer Course. There are a lot of front-end frameworks,such as Bootstrap,Foundation by ZURB,Angular,Backbone and etc.But the number of really good ones are just a few.In this course, we'll learn the four Most Popular Front-end Frameworks: angular.js, backbone.js, react.js and ember.js. This course will get you up and running quickly, and teach you the core knowledge you need to deeply understand and build a complete applications with these four front-end frameworks.It has been divided into following main sections:

  1. Building the REST API
  2. Setup Application
  3. The Model
  4. The Router

This course will help you quickly master all the difficult concepts and the learning will be a breeze.

Let's get started!
title: The Complete Front-End Frameworks Developer Course
